auth.name: Name
auth.enterEmailPassword: Enter your email and password to sign in.
auth.enterDetails: Enter your details to register. You will be logged in after registration.
auth.promoDescription: Create an account to quickly find jobs perfectly matched to you.
auth.promoCtaLogin: I already have an account â€“ log in
auth.promoBarText: Do you have or want to create an Hoplo account?
auth.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the terms and privacy policy.
auth.termsLabel: I accept the terms of service
auth.redirectingToLogin: You will be redirected to the login page shortly.
auth.profileFetchTimeout: Loading profile is taking too long. Check if the backend is running (e.g. on port 3001).
auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter the email address associated with your account. We will send you a link to set a new password.
auth.forgotPasswordSuccess: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a link to set a new password.
auth.resetPasswordDesc: Enter your new password and confirm it. The link from the email is valid for 1 hour.
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Your password has been reset. You can now log in.
auth.noResetToken: No reset link. Use the link from the email or request a new one.

profile.editProfileDesc: Change your name, surname, email address or password. After changing password you will be logged out.
profile.passwordMinLength: Min. 6 characters. After changing password you will be logged out.
profile.contractorProfileDesc: A contractor profile is your public profile (company or individual). You can create a profile or edit an existing one.
profile.contractorProfileNone: You don't have a contractor profile yet.
profile.phoneDesc: We use it only for important information about application status.
profile.companyIdPlaceholder: Linked company ID (e.g. from company list)
profile.noPasswordGoogle: You don't have a password because you signed in with Google. You can set a password by entering it twice â€“ then you can log in with both Google and your password.
profile.passwordBothRequired: Enter the new password in both fields.
profile.defaultMessageDesc: Welcome message with portfolio links. You can personalize it during each submission.
profile.defaultMessagePlaceholder:
Hello! I'm interested in this offer. Here are links to my portfolio:

- Portfolio: https://example.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/username

I'm happy to answer any questions!

onboarding.phoneDesc: We will use it only to send important information about application status (e.g. offer accepted, status updates).
onboarding.phoneSettingsNote: You can change notification options later in settings.
onboarding.enterNameSurname: Your data will not be publicly visible. Under the application only your first name and the first letter of your surname will be visible. Your data will be seen by the person you choose as the contractor for your offer.
onboarding.chooseAccountTypeDesc: Choose whether you are a client looking for a freelancer or a freelancer looking for work.
onboarding.clientDesc: I'm looking for a freelancer and want to publish jobs
onboarding.freelancerDesc: I'm looking for clients and want to apply to jobs
onboarding.companyDesc: Optional â€“ enter your company tax ID (NIP) if you invoice through a business.
onboarding.companyChooseOption: Please choose whether you have a company.
onboarding.freelancerSkillsDesc: Select the skills you have so we can better match you with jobs.
onboarding.freelancerDefaultMessageDesc: Create a welcome message with portfolio links. You can personalize it during each submission.
onboarding.freelancerDefaultMessagePlaceholder:
Hello! I'm interested in this offer. Here are links to my portfolio:

- Portfolio: https://example.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/username

I'm happy to answer any questions!
onboarding.freelancerDefaultMessageHint: You can change this message later in profile settings.
onboarding.profileQuestionTitle: Do you want to create a contractor profile?
onboarding.profileQuestionDescription: A company or individual profile lets you present yourself publicly. You can create it now or skip and come back later.
onboarding.profileQuestionYes: Yes, I want to create a profile

agreements.title: Accept Terms and Privacy Policy
agreements.description: To use the service you must accept the current terms of service and privacy policy. Without this acceptance you cannot use the service.
agreements.termsLabel: I accept the terms of service
agreements.acceptFailed: Failed to save acceptance. Refresh the page and try again.

company.profileNotFoundDesc: This profile does not exist or is not yet verified.
company.pendingVerification: Profile is pending verification. After verification it will be visible publicly.
company.editDescription: Update profile details. After verification it will be visible at /company/profile-slug.

jobs.headerSampleWithCategory: Check out a sample of the {count} {category} jobs posted on Hoplo
jobs.headerSampleWithoutCategory: Check out a sample of the {count} jobs posted on Hoplo
jobs.editJobDescription: After saving, the job will return to "Draft" status and will require re-approval by an administrator.
jobs.noJobs: No jobs. Add the first job!
jobs.noFavorites: You don't have any saved jobs yet. Click the star next to a job to add it to favorites.
jobs.draftVisibleOnlyToYou: Draft â€” visible only to you.
jobs.waitingForAdmin: Waiting for administrator approval. Visible only to author.
jobs.title: Title
jobs.fillRequired: Fill in title, description and category
jobs.selectHoursPerWeek: For hourly billing, select hours per week
jobs.invalidOfferDays: Days to collect offers: choose 7, 14, 21 or 30 days
jobs.deadlinePassedMessage: Application deadline has passed. You can no longer apply.
jobs.author: Author
jobs.noApplicationsYetBeFirst: No applications yet, be the first!

newJobForm.title: New job
newJobForm.description: Fill in the job details. Billing fields and skills will help match the offer.
newJobForm.skillsDescription: Select from list or type name and press Enter to add (including new skill).
newJobForm.skillsMaxCount: You can add at most 5 skills.
newJobForm.suggestedRateNote: We've suggested a market rate, but you can change it
newJobForm.billingTypeFixedDescription: Fixed rate for the entire project regardless of working time

draftModal.beforeLoginDescription: Your job posting has been saved in browser memory. You need to log in to publish it.
draftModal.afterLoginDescription: You have a saved job in memory. Do you want to return to editing and publish it?

branding.logotypeTagline: Publish and search offers for freelancers

homepage.heroText: The easiest way to connect businesses and top freelancers
homepage.welcomeTitle: The easiest way to connect companies and the best freelancers
homepage.heroTextFindingJobs: Find gigs and collaboration that match your skills
